name: Terra incognita (nyanpierre)
description:
Terra incognita is a walking simulator created for the game jam of "Area of effect". Its theme was "Signs of Life". 

Credit : 

- Boussin Pierre : Game designer / product manager

https://nyanpierre.wixsite.com/boussinpierre

- Baptiste Meriau : Game designer / Voice actor

- Timothée Daemers : Sound designer
